last_episode_to_air.name: Cancun, Baby!
last_episode_to_air.overview: The gang decides to leave the mansion in Zihuatenajo and find a new place to live, but Tandy has second thoughts.

name: The Last Man on Earth
overview: The year is 2022, and after an unlikely event, only one man is left on earth: Phil Miller, who used to be just an average guy who loved his family and hated his job at the bank. Now, in his RV, Phil searches the country for other survivors.

episodes.name: Alive in Tucson
episodes.overview: He has traveled to every city, every town and every outpost in the United States, Mexico and Canada, and has found no one. As he returns to his hometown of Tucson, Phil comes to the realization that he is almost certainly the last living being on the face of the earth.

episodes.name: The Elephant in the Room
episodes.overview: Phil finds out he's not the last person left on Earth, but things aren't as wonderful as he would have hoped.

episodes.name: Raisin Balls and Wedding Bells
episodes.overview: Phil's prayers have been answered—sort of—now that he has found the last woman on earth, Carol.  He finds himself back among human existence, and somehow engaged to be married.

episodes.name: Sweet Melissa
episodes.overview: Phil and Carol are shocked to find Melissa, another survivor, just after Phil reluctantly agreed to marry Carol. Phil finds himself in a pickle and has to work fast in order to save human existence.

episodes.name: Dunk the Skunk
episodes.overview: Re-population is the talk of Tucson as Phil navigates the choppy waters between Carol and Melissa.

episodes.name: Some Friggin' Fat Dude
episodes.overview: Phil Miller continues to live in Tucson.

episodes.name: She Drives Me Crazy
episodes.overview: The knowledge that Todd and Melissa are having sex drives Phil to manic despair, so Phil arranges a community meeting to discuss grievances. However, his plans go awry when everyone instead agrees that he should clean out the pool he has been using as a toilet. The next day, Phil schemes to leave Todd in the desert to die, but his conscience prevents him from doing so. Todd expresses gratitude to Phil for helping him find his way to Tucson, which motivates Phil to finally clean out his toilet pool and bring an outhouse into his home, much to Carol's delight.

episodes.name: Mooovin' In
episodes.overview: Phil becomes annoyed at all the attention Todd is receiving and schemes to bring the attention back to himself when he finds a stray cow. To do so, he pretends to steal the cow, but when he really does lose it, Todd eventually finds it and allows Phil to take the credit. That night, the group discovers that the cow has apparently wandered up the stairs of Carol's house and is now stranded, causing Carol to officially move in with Phil. In a brief flashback, Carol is seen purposely bringing the cow upstairs.

episodes.name: The Do-Over
episodes.overview: The cul de sac decides to have a re-election for the President of the United States.

episodes.name: Pranks for Nothin'
episodes.overview: Everyone is mad at Phil for lying as they refuse to speak to Phil, and he is shunned. Carol also holds a grudge against Erica and Gail. Phil confronts the group and tells the truth about various issues, including the fact that he never wanted to marry Carol. Carol, who is a notary, divorces Phil, then forgives him and invites him back to the cul-de-sac.

episodes.name: Moved to Tampa
episodes.overview: Phil Miller continues his life.

episodes.name: The Tandyman Can
episodes.overview: The cul de sac decides to have a re-election for the President of the United States.

episodes.name: Screw the Moon
episodes.overview: Phil and Carol reconcile their differences.

episodes.name: Is There Anybody Out There?
episodes.overview: Phil and Carol leave on their road trip across the United States, but Carol quickly regrets her decision to leave.

episodes.name: The Boo
episodes.overview: Phil searches desperately for Carol after they’re separated without phones or walkie-talkies.

episodes.name: Dead Man Walking
episodes.overview: Carol takes a page out of Phil’s book when she tells a lie from which it is difficult for her to recover.

episodes.name: C To The T
episodes.overview: Phil/Tandy finds redemption when he saves the day.

episodes.name: Crickets
episodes.overview: The population may be small, but it’s still big enough for big, dark secrets.

episodes.name: A Real Live Wire
episodes.overview: Tandy and Todd attempt to solve an end-of-the-world power problem.

episodes.name: Baby Steps
episodes.overview: Re-population becomes a hot topic with the Malibu survivors.

episodes.name: No Bull
episodes.overview: Phil 2 finds himself on Tandy’s level when he causes problems with the group.

episodes.name: Secret Santa
episodes.overview: Along with most human life, the virus wiped out normal traditions and holidays. As Christmas approaches, Carol spearheads a “Secret Santa” gift exchange to spread some festive cheer.

episodes.name: Silent Night
episodes.overview: A medical condition and a marriage proposal leave the group in turmoil.

episodes.name: Pitch Black
episodes.overview: Mike Miller’s space capsule careening through the sky toward Earth, finally putting him on the same planet as his big brother, Phil. Mike thinks he is the last man on earth, but who knows what or whom he might encounter.

episodes.name: Valhalla
episodes.overview: The gang look for closure following a tragic event. Melissa and Todd attempt to deal with the consequences of her surprise proposal.

episodes.name: Fish in the Dish
episodes.overview: Carol is back on the campaign for repopulation with Phil, and Todd’s juggling act finally puts him over the edge.

episodes.name: Skidmark
episodes.overview: Tandy tries to host a party for the group and Todd’s luck takes a turn for the better.

episodes.name: Fourth Finger
episodes.overview: With little else to do, Tandy starts a prank war within the group. Meanwhile Todd establishes his dominance.

episodes.name: Falling Slowly
episodes.overview: Todd considers doing a favor for Tandy and Carol. Gail's drinking becomes an issue.

episodes.name: Smart And Stupid
episodes.overview: As Tandy gets used to having his brother back on Earth, Todd begins feeling left out; Mike discovers more about Erica than the group has ever known.

episodes.name: 30 Years of Science Down the Tubes
episodes.overview: Phil and Mike grow closer than ever and the whole Malibu group gets a big friggin’ surprise.

episodes.name: General Breast Theme with Cobras
episodes.overview: The safety of Tandy and the group is in jeopardy as armed intruders storm the Malibu beach near their home, and no one can agree on what to do. While Melissa takes drastic action, Tandy gets a new lesson in fashion.

episodes.name: The Wild Guess Express
episodes.overview: When Todd suffers from major remorse over recent actions, Tandy tries to lift his best friend’s spirits – even if it requires a few white lies.

episodes.name: You're All Going to Diet
episodes.overview: Tandy sets up a unique alarm system in the house, but Melissa has already put her own safety precautions in place. The whole group decides to enjoy a change in scenery.

episodes.name: Five Hoda Kotbs
episodes.overview: The group's road trip is marred by internal squabbles, but Gail might be the first to lose control.

episodes.name: The Power of Power
episodes.overview: The search for a new home isn't easy for the group, especially when someone may be deliberately trying to stop them. Meanwhile, the love triangle between Todd, Gail and Melissa starts losing steam.

episodes.name: The Open-Ended Nature of Unwitnessed Deaths
episodes.overview: Tandy wants to learn about Lewis' past, while Carol asks Gail a favor and Todd helps Melissa deal with her mental state.

episodes.name: Mama's Hideaway
episodes.overview: Carol will stop at nothing to get the perfect family photo. In the meantime, Melissa has her own mission, Lewis looks for a new hobby and Gail ends up in a scary situation.

episodes.name: Whitney Houston, We Have a Problem
episodes.overview: The group sets off to find Melissa when they find a note she left saying "Goodbye". In the meantime, Gail has her own adventure.

episodes.name: If You're Happy and You Know It
episodes.overview: Carol is feeling depressed about Gail's absence so Tandy takes her on the honeymoon vacation they never had.

episodes.name: Got Milk?
episodes.overview: The first moments of the deadly virus outbreak are revealed through a special lens.

episodes.name: The Spirit of St. Lewis
episodes.overview: After being locked up for her own safety, Melissa plays hurtful mind games with the group. Meanwhile, Todd and the group explore medications that might help her, and Lewis goes on a new solo adventure.

episodes.name: Hair of the Dog
episodes.overview: Todd and Tandy dig deep into Melissa's pre-virus past, as they search for answers about her illness, and Carol adopts a new outlook on life.

episodes.name: Find This Thing We Need To
episodes.overview: Carol enlists Tandy and Erica to help find answers when she makes a shocking discovery. In the meantime, Todd has a breakthrough with Melissa.

episodes.name: Point Person Knows Best
episodes.overview: Tandy tries to take charge of a new situation that has unfolded in the group, and Carol is suspicious of Todd's behavior.

episodes.name: Name 20 Picnics... Now!
episodes.overview: The gang throws a huge celebration canvassing every major holiday, but Tandy and Todd's bro-mance hits a rough patch that threatens to end the fun.

episodes.name: The Big Day
episodes.overview: Tandy and Gail face off in a major disagreement, on which the whole group must weigh in, and Carol is forced to choose a side. Meanwhile, Melissa, Todd and Erica each have major milestone moments.

episodes.name: When The Going Gets Tough
episodes.overview: The long term consequences of surviving an apocalypse start to have a major impact on the group, whose daily life is upended.

episodes.name: Nature's Horchata
episodes.overview: A new problem arises for our survivors and they decide to take to the sea, when a couple of unexpected guests crash the party.

episodes.name: M.U.B.A.R.
episodes.overview: A new woman joins the group and tries to find her place while everybody else prepares to set sail for Mexico.

episodes.name: Stocko Syndrome
episodes.overview: Tandy devises an escape plan to get away from Pamela and back to Carol and the others. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang encounters a castaway, Glenn, who has been stranded on an island for years.

episodes.name: Skeleton Crew
episodes.overview: Pamela tries desperately to redeem herself with everyone, as the gang finally reaches Mexico. Meanwhile, Todd is disappointed that Zihuatanejo is not the paradise of which he'd dreamed.

episodes.name: Wisconsin
episodes.overview: Carol panics when Todd and Melissa leave for their honeymoon, and Erica and Gail decide to live on their own for a while.

episodes.name: La Abuela
episodes.overview: The gang moves into an old mansion; Carol forces Tandy to put down his new toys so they can baby-proof the giant estate; Melissa worries about Todd's health; Gail and Erica can't figure out why Dawn won't stop crying.

episodes.name: Double Cheeseburger
episodes.overview: Carol's pregnancy takes an unexpected turn; Gail is concerned about Tandy as a father; Melissa discourages Todd's baby fever.

episodes.name: Gender Friender
episodes.overview: Tandy tries to convince everyone he's a feminist.

episodes.name: Not Appropriate For Miners
episodes.overview: Todd asks Tandy for parenting advice when he notices that Jasper is acting more reckless than usual. Meanwhile, Carol and Erica realize that Jasper may be the only potential suitor for their babies and begin vying for his attention.

episodes.name: Karl
episodes.overview: Tandy and Todd stumble upon a new survivor, Karl, who has been trapped in a high-security prison in Mexico ever since the virus hit.

episodes.name: Paint Misbehavin'
episodes.overview: Tandy and Todd introduce newcomer Karl to the rest of the gang. Meanwhile, the group searches for Jasper, who has gone missing.

episodes.name: Hamilton/Berg
episodes.overview: After the graveyard incident, Tandy and Todd try to convince the rest of the gang that something is majorly wrong with Karl and something needs to be done. Meanwhile, Jasper is still missing.

episodes.name: Señor Clean
episodes.overview: Tandy tries being a helpful, responsible adult in order to finally win Gail's praise. Meanwhile, Todd is furious with Melissa for keeping him away from Jasper.

episodes.name: Release the Hounds
episodes.overview: Todd sinks into a deep depression, leaving the rest of the gang to console him. Meanwhile, Tandy and Carol can't keep their hands off each other.

episodes.name: Special Delivery
episodes.overview: While Todd butts heads with Erica, Melissa is determined to form a strong female friendship with her. Meanwhile, Carol grows suspicious that a new stranger could be living nearby.

episodes.name: Designated Survivors
episodes.overview: Tandy wakes up to a shocking discovery that is positive for everyone in the group, but it throws Todd into a spiral. Meanwhile, Todd and Erica share an emotional roller coaster.

episodes.name: The Blob
episodes.overview: A thermal heat detector reveals a potential sign of life outside of the Zihuatanejo village, but Tandy doesn't want the group to split up to go investigate. Meanwhile, Todd and Erica have trouble seeing eye-to-eye.

episodes.name: Barbara Ann
episodes.overview: The gang ventures out in search of what they think could be a new sign of life, but are surprised at what they actually find. Meanwhile, Todd makes a few morbid discoveries of his own back at the mansion.

episodes.name: Cancun, Baby!
episodes.overview: The gang decides to leave the mansion in Zihuatenajo and find a new place to live, but Tandy has second thoughts.
